Join Our Team
Employment at the Family Fun Center demands an enthusiastic person who is comfortable interacting with the public. We are in the business of providing family fun in a clean, safe, and comfortable environment. Our team is vital to delivering that quality experience to our guests. All jobs may require working hours at night and on weekends. The Family Fun Center is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
Interested in joining the Family Fun Center Team? The Family Fun Center Employment Application is available for download in .pdf format. Please note that you will need Adobe Acrobat Reader to open this file. Please
Click Here
to download an application.
Please submit completed applications in person to the manager on duty between 10am and 5pm Monday – Thursday. If your experience and skill sets would add value to our community, we will contact you for a follow-up interview.

Family Fun Center of Lakeland is the best place for Family Fun and Entertainment in Lakeland, FL. We have everything! Tons of video and arcade games, Mini-golf, Laser Tag, Funtasia, Parties, and More! Book your next outing today or bring the family in to play!

Contact Us
We are open 7 days a week…
Family Fun Center has additional safety and sanitation procedures in place. Closing hours have also been adjusted to allow for extra nightly cleaning and sanitation.
Friday and Saturday:
10am – Midnight
Monday thru Thursday:
10am – 9pm
Sunday:
Noon – 9pm
**Funtasia closes one hour early each night and 2 hours early on Tuesdays and Thursdays for cleaning**
For the enjoyment and safety of all guests, we cannot allow the following:
Running
Skateboards, skates, or skate shoes
Offensive clothing or offensive tattoos
Profanity and unruly behavior
Smoking and vaping
Alcohol and illegal drugs
Weapons of any kind
Overnight vehicles
Loitering
Presents, cakes, cupcakes, balloons, etc. are only permitted with a scheduled party (parties may be scheduled same day). Ages 14 and under must be accompanied by an adult. Shirt and shoes required. No soliciting.
Service dogs/animals are permitted at all times. Service dogs are defined by the ADA as “a dog that is individually trained to do work or perform tasks for a person with a disability.” All other pets are not permitted.
We are located at…
4825 South Florida Ave.
Lakeland, FL 33813
Our phone number is…
(863) 644-1728
Social Media
Twitter Handle
#thefuncenter
Connect with us on Facebook…

Group Events
We’re Great for Groups!
Family Fun Center is a great place for groups and gatherings including: school groups & outings, church and youth groups, day camps, corporate outings, team building experiences, and many more.
Special rates are available if your group…
Consist of 10 or more people
Pay in one single group payment
Book at least one day in advance of arrival
We will customize an outing to fit your time and budget needs, so give us a call at 863-644-1728 to plan your visit. 50% deposit of the estimated group total is due at the time of booking with the balance due on the
date of the event.
Time Play Packages
No tickets will accrue on any game during Time Play. Certain games may not be available while on Time Play.
1 Hour Time Play Pass
Includes 1 hour of unlimited attractions and video games
$12.99 per person
Additional Hours
$9.99 per hour per person
Redemption Play Packages
Win tickets & earn prizes!
3 Attractions & 80 Game Credits
Attraction choices: Laser Tag, Laser Maze, Miniature Golf, or 30 minutes in Funtasia (12 & Under only)
$24.99 per person
2 Attractions & 40 Game Credits
Attraction choices: Laser Tag, Laser Maze, Miniature Golf, or 30 minutes in Funtasia (12 & Under only)
$14.99 per person
1 Attraction & 20 Game Credits
Attraction choices: Laser Tag, Laser Maze, Miniature Golf, or 30 minutes in Funtasia (12 & Under only)
$9.99 per person
Add a Meal Deal to any Group Package!
Meal deal includes 2 slices of pizza and a medium drink for $5 per person. Or, you may elect to buy group rate pizzas at $12 per cheese or pepperoni pizza and pitchers of soft drinks for $6 per pitcher.
Want to bring a cake and candles?
Check out our Birthday Party package options!
